'''Tommy Robinson''' is a noted anti-Muslim agitator, and career criminal ([https://web.archive.org/web/20130313170714/http://news.sky.com/story/1034468/edl-leader-lennon-jailed-for-passport-offence convicted for having a fake passport in 2012], [http://www.bbc.com/news/uk-england-25110639 sentenced to 18 months in prison for mortgage fraud in 2014], to name a few crimes). Tommy Robinson real name appears to be '''Stephen Lennon.'''

Tommy is a terrible Islamophobe, but also apparently doesn't mind them so much that he won't [https://web.archive.org/web/*/http://www.loonwatch.com/2012/05/edl-leader-tommy-robinson-outed-as-child-sex-pest/ try to flirt with a 15 year old Muslim on Twitter]. Tommy Robinson seriously sucks.
